commit message:
v0.9.93 complete - bug fix for notifications not showing if conversation screen is open when phone sleeps (messages were being marked read before SMS Popup could spot them).

Also added code to detect if the phone is in a call and not setting vibrate/ringtone to try and help issue with ringtone stopping.
